woco_file.help: string, path to world coordinate image

test_file.help: string, path to step image to use for testing

exp_images.help: list of strings, paths to all experiment images, assumed to be ordered by time

xw.help: 1D vector, x-position of control points in world coordinates

yw.help: 1D vector, x-position of control points in world coordinates

xp.help: 1D vector, x-position of control points in pixel coordinates

yp.help: 1D vector, x-position of control points in pixel coordinates

xlim.help: 2-element array, minimum and maximum x coordinates for crop in world coordinate units (m)

ylim.help: 2-element array, minimum and maximum y coordinates for crop in world coordinate units (m)

poly.help: 2D array, vertices of mask polygons, x-coords in row 1 and y-coords in row 2, polygons separated by NaN

hue_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0, 1]. [minimum, maximum] HSV 'hue' included as sand in the mask

value_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0,1]. [minimum, maximum] HSV 'value' included as sand in the mask

entropy_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0, 1]. [minimum, maximum] entropy included as sand in the mask

entropy_len.help: scalar, integer, window size in pixels for entropy filter

morph_open_rad.help: scalar, double, radius of disk structuring element used in mophological opening filter

morph_erode_rad.help: scalar, double, radius of disk structuring element used in mophological erosion filter
